#summary New Widget - Embed YouTube videos in your GWT application
#labels Type-Widget

= Introduction =
The YouTubeViewer Widget embeds a YouTube video in your GWT application.  It supports basic options such as changing the video, auto play, and links to related videos.

Example:
[http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/demo/YouTubeViewer/index.html]


= CSS =

Here is an example CSS style for the YouTubeViewer Widget:
{{{
.YouTubeViewer {
	border: 2px solid #AAAAAA;
	padding: 10px;
	background: #DDDDDD
}
}}}


= Sample Code =

{{{
  YouTubeViewer viewer = new YouTubeViewer("k56DbGDBsNk");
}}
